name: Recordance
description:
2223 Giant corporations have perfected a process called 'Transference'
This process allows the consciousness of an individual to be transferred
to a mechanoid host. You are one of these individuals…

Utilize your arsenal of experimental weapon modules to survive ever increasing odds and defeat an unknown enemy across multiple environments in this action packed sci-fi first person shooter.


The early access version of Recordance contains the following features.


Gameplay

Game mode: Recordance currently contains one game mode 'Mother mode' In this mode the aim is to defeat the mother unit on each of the 3 available levels whilst facing increasing number and difficulty of enemies. More game modes are already in development.

Enemies: A diverse set of enemy types including numerous droid classes, drones, attack aircraft and fighter jets.

Levels: There are currently 3 levels to fight across,

Sky Facility: An urban and industrial complex set in the stars

Mars: A small outpost set up by the Androdyne Corporation on the red planet

Surface Facility: A mining facility on earth

Weapons, vehicles and customisation

Recordance contains many opportunities for upgradeability and customisation during gameplay. All upgrades are purchaseable using credits earned during combat.


Weapon modules: There are currently 12 weapon modules to unlock and equip with more to come.

Player droid customisation: Recordance allows the player to upgrade both the physical and performance parameters of the players droid. Currently there are limited upgrade parts available but more are currently in development.

Vehicles: Vehicle types: Hovercars, Hoverbikes and Aircraft.

Curently there are 3 models of car available which allow full customisation including body parts, weapon systems, performance upgrades and material customisation. Bikes currently allow performance upgrades and material customisation. Full customisation for bikes as well as more car, bike and aircraft models as well as more weapon systems coming in future updates.
